sourceMeaningMnemonic: Use your <radical>mouth</radical> to take a <radical>measurement</radical> of this <kanji>group</kanji>. Just stretch your mouth out and around every single person. Get 'em all in there.
meaningInfo: I hope this group is full of people who enjoy being inside someone else's mouth, because they're gonna be pretty mad when you let them out if they aren't.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>group</kanji> is so big it takes you till <reading>dawn</reading> (<ja>だん</ja>) to get your measurement: they weigh a <reading>ton</reading> (<ja>とん</ja>) too!
readingInfo: Imagine letting this group of, now very wet, people out of your mouth one by one. They don't seem to care that they weigh a ton! That's a large measurement, they should be proud.
